title: Marlborough horse racing tips for Monday, October 28
text:
Welcome to our daily tipping service provided by Telegraph Sport's very own champion tipster Marlborough.

Attending a meeting today? In need of some guidance? Or just fancy a flutter? You've come to the right place.

Each day Marlborough will bring you the best bets from every race at every racecourse around the country.

From the bright lights of the Cheltenham Festival and Glorious Goodwood to a low-key evening meeting at Chelmsford City, we have all bases covered.

Looking for a daily nap? There is no better place to come. Marlborough will indicate his top tip for the day in traditional style, with any other notable selections highlighted with "nb".
